DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect High Intensity Interval Training ( HIT ) insulin sensitivity skeletal muscle patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Interval Training ( HIT ) Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Physical exercise increase insulin sensitivity skeletal muscle healthy well individual type 2 diabetes , implies considerable time commitment . High intensity interval training ( HIT ) time-efficient exercise consist repeat bout short duration high intensive workload . The aim study determine effect HIT patient type 2 diabetes , clarify mechanism possible positive effect HIT . Exercise perform 2 week one-legged training ergometer bicycle . Thus one leg serve control leg . Insulin sensitivity train non-trained muscle measure completion overall training program euglycemic hyperinsulinemic clamp method a-v catheterization leg . Muscle biopsy obtain train period measure muscle glycogen content , muscle biopsy analysis obtain experimental day .
DOC.criteria: 10 subject Type 2 diabetes . 10 healthy control subject . BMI 2835 diet tablet treatment diabetes regular physical activity diseases type 2 diabetes insulin treatment
